name: Year 2025
description:
YEAR 2025 | Bitsy Game Made by: Hans Dimaano

This is my summative assessment 2 for my module "Digital Storytelling". My game focuses on telling a story, rather than having an adventure on finding and unlocking things. If ever you are stuck in a flashback and don't know what to do, just keep pressing the right arrow, or "D" to move forward.
